Articles.Content:
Take this test here [http://www.bronyland.com/pony-personality-test/](http://www.bronyland.com/pony-personality-test/)

And post the results and vote in the poll.

Reasons why this isnt in the megathread, wanted a poll, and a topic totally dediated to this.
Looks like I\'m a Rainbow Dash
I thought I was a RD, but it turns out I\'m a Twilight.

First off, this is a very old test.

Second, this better not be because of our steam convo
Twilight, but Rarity is very near, according to the test.

Oh well, took the test for fun, turned out *exactly* as i thought it would.

> ![ca2e1c08f5a27d4b14352bf65afbb463.jpg](http://i461.photobucket.com/albums/qq333/Ascensiam/ca2e1c08f5a27d4b14352bf65afbb463.jpg)
> ![banner_fluttershy.jpg](http://www.bronyland.com/images/quiz/banner_fluttershy.jpg)

Although some of the questions are confusing to me, such as favorite numbers. What does that have to do with pony similarity?
![NpwJj.png](http://i.imgur.com/NpwJj.png)

> 
> First off, this is a very old test.
> 
> Second, this better not be because of our steam convo

No I was going to do this anyway.

> 
> > ![NpwJj.png](http://i.imgur.com/NpwJj.png)

Nova, you know better than that.

> 
> Oh well, took the test for fun, turned out *exactly* as i thought it would.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> > ![ca2e1c08f5a27d4b14352bf65afbb463.jpg](http://i461.photobucket.com/albums/qq333/Ascensiam/ca2e1c08f5a27d4b14352bf65afbb463.jpg)
> > ![banner_fluttershy.jpg](http://www.bronyland.com/images/quiz/banner_fluttershy.jpg)
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Although some of the questions are confusing to me, such as favorite numbers. What does that have to do with pony similarity?

I knew you had some rarity in you.

I followed the scientific method, with these variables:

4 separate tests

Independent: Honest answers (I wouldn\'t outright lie, but I slightly altered my opinion to another, still-correct answer)

Control: Same answers on non-personality questions (i,e: colour)

Dependent (Result): Rarity to Fluttershy (2 Rarity, 1 Fluttershy, 1 Applejack\*)

\*I have no clue why I got Applejack, and so disposed of the data, seeing it as a random fault.

Um, who left the coral gate open?

Keep it to your MLP thread folks, you know the deal.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

> 
> Um, who left the coral gate open?
> 
> Keep it to your MLP thread folks, you know the deal.
> 
> Cheers!
> 
> Capt\'n Skunky
> 
> KSP Community Manager

I can\'t set up a poll in the mlp thread.
And that\'s why we need an /oats/ just for us (you can even hide or misname it).

> 
> And that\'s why we need an /oats/ just for us (you can even hide or misname it).

Yeah, no, in that case you should go for some other forums to satisfy your demand for uncontrolled pony. It won\'t be here at this time.

A forum JUST for talking about ponies?

[If only such a thing existed.](https://www.google.com/search?q=My+little+pony+forum)

> 
> A forum JUST for talking about ponies?
> 
> [If only such a thing existed.](https://www.google.com/search?q=My+little+pony+forum)

I was just on mlp forums.com then switched to this tos we of anyone posted.

> 
> I was just on mlp forums.com then switched to this tos we of anyone posted.

What?

> 
> What?

Translation: I was just on the My Little Pony Forum website, then I switched to this thread to check if anyone had posted.

When I saw the title I thought \'there are fursonas for bronies?\'

Which turned out to not be what the thread was about. So on this occasion, I cannot say \'you learn something new every day.\'
Can I say burn the brone now? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Can I say burn the brone now? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> ![im-watching-you-meme.gif?w=422](http://mememagnetic.files.wordpress.com/2012/02/im-watching-you-meme.gif?w=422)

Aaaaand we\'re reached the end of this topic. Keep your brony posts on the MLP thread.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
